artist: Painter: After Domenichino; Engraver: Claude Randon
description: Cupid seated in a chariot drawn by 2 doves; 2 winged putti holding flowers above
inscription:
Inscription

on sheet in black: [Domenic Zampiere pinxit   C. Randon Remes sculp Romæ/ (dedication to John Baptiste Colbert and coat of arms)/ Romæ exfficna lo Jacobi de Rubeio as Temp A>M> de Pace cum priv S.P.]; in pencil in plate: [1-354]; in pencil on sheet: [1/6]
title: Triumph of Cupid
